topics.body:
Have I ever mentioned how I love that you can hear Godzilla and the muto's joints creaking in the new movie? It's a detail that's completely unnecessary but I love that it's there. They sound like freaking houses settling. 

"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544fec5a63687246e68f0100#post_544fec5a63687246e68f0100
It's the most common Halloween candy. It's not amazing but I was honestly surprised when I found out that people thought it was the worst shit ever.
